message.content:
write a script for an advertisement for a music school

Title: Unleash Your Inner Mozart at Symphony Music School

[Background music begins. Soft and soothing classical piece]

Scene 1: [Aerial shot of the elegant exterior of Symphony Music School]

Narrator (V.O): Welcome to Symphony Music School, where our passion is turning your musical dreams into reality.

Scene 2: [Close-up shots of various instruments being played elegantly by students]

Narrator (V.O): Our world-class faculty are here to offer you individualized instruction on a wide variety of instruments…

Text overlay: Piano, violin, guitar, drums & more!

Scene 3: [Interior panorama montage featuring well-lit practice rooms bustling with activity]

Narrator (V.O): …in spacious facilities designed to inspire and foster creativity.

Scene 4: [Split screen – Left side shows teachers mentoring different age groups in classrooms; Right side displays various notable composers e.g. Mozart, Beethoven, Bach etc.]

Narrator (V.O): From young prodigies-to-be to seasoned pros fine-tuning their talents - We cover it all! Come learn from the masters that shaped the future musicians around them.

Text overlay on left side during split-screen scene:

- Beginners
- Intermediate
- Advanced

Scene 5: [Montage showing one-on-one lessons with positive interactions between instructors and students] 

Narratory(V.O.): At Symphony Music School we cater tailored programs just for you - ensuring steady progress while enhancing your natural flair!

Text overlay during montage:

One-On-One Lessons:
-Personalized Curriculum
-Skilled Instructors 
-Flexible Schedules



                        
             
[next slide]:


    Special Programs
        ⁃ Choral
